title: CTUD (FunctionBlock)
text:
FUNCTION_BLOCK CTUD
Increments and decrements a given value
Note
Datatype
WORD
, which is used for
PV
in CODESYS, does not match the IEC standard, which for
PV
defines datatype
INT
.
(* Example declaration *)
CTUDInst
:
CUTD
;
(* Example in ST *)
CTUDInst
(
CU
:=
VarBOOL1
,
CD
:=
VarBOOL2
,
RESET
:=
VarBOOL3
,
LOAD
:=
VarBOOL4
,
PV
:=
VarWORD1
);
VarBOOL5
:=
CTUDInst.QU
;
VarBOOL6
:=
CTUDInst.QD
;
VarWORD2
:=
CTUDInst.CV
;

rows: Start value for decrementing / upper limit for incrementing
